name: FoodFall
description:
In the land of Garbage World Food, Coins,  Jewels, tools, and even more rain down from the clouds. it is your job to brave the junk rains to catch food while avoiding the random junk that also falls. Careful of the coins and jewels they will ruin your food and score.

Goal: Catch food products that rain down and survive as long as possible. Avoid coins, jewels, and other larger items. the larger items will hurt while smaller objects only waste bucket space

--Movement : "A"&"D" \\ Left + Right Arrow Keys--

This is a project for: GameDev.tv Game Jam 2021 **source in windows build zip
